uid.description: 32-bit signed integer unique to this world info entry/folder.

disable_input_formatting.description: When enabled, all input formatting options default to `false` instead of the value in the KoboldAI GUI

disable_output_formatting.description: When enabled, all output formatting options default to `false` instead of the value in the KoboldAI GUI.

frmtadsnsp.description:
Input formatting option. When enabled, adds a leading space to your input if there is no trailing whitespace at the end of the previous action.

If `disable_input_formatting` is `true`, this defaults to `false` instead of the value in the KoboldAI GUI.

frmtrmblln.description:
Output formatting option. When enabled, replaces all occurrences of two or more consecutive newlines in the output with one newline.

If `disable_output_formatting` is `true`, this defaults to `false` instead of the value in the KoboldAI GUI.

frmtrmspch.description:
Output formatting option. When enabled, removes `#/@%{}+=~|\^<>` from the output.

If `disable_output_formatting` is `true`, this defaults to `false` instead of the value in the KoboldAI GUI.

frmttriminc.description:
Output formatting option. When enabled, removes some characters from the end of the output such that the output doesn't end in the middle of a sentence. If the output is less than one sentence long, does nothing.

If `disable_output_formatting` is `true`, this defaults to `false` instead of the value in the KoboldAI GUI.

max_context_length.description: Maximum number of tokens to send to the model.

quiet.description: When enabled, Generated output will not be displayed in the console.

sampler_full_determinism.description: If enabled, the generated text will always be the same as long as you use the same RNG seed, input and settings. If disabled, only the *sequence* of generated texts that you get when repeatedly generating text will be the same given the same RNG seed, input and settings.

sampler_order.description: Sampler order to be used. If N is the length of this array, then N must be greater than or equal to 6 and the array must be a permutation of the first N non-negative integers.

sampler_seed.description: RNG seed to use for sampling. If not specified, the global RNG will be used.

singleline.description:
Output formatting option. When enabled, removes everything after the first line of the output, including the newline.

If `disable_output_formatting` is `true`, this defaults to `false` instead of the value in the KoboldAI GUI.

soft_prompt.description: Soft prompt to use when generating. If set to the empty string or any other string containing no non-whitespace characters, uses no soft prompt.

stop_sequence.description: An array of string sequences where the API will stop generating further tokens. The returned text WILL contain the stop sequence.

use_authors_note.description: Whether or not to use the author's note from the KoboldAI GUI when generating text. This has no effect unless `use_story` is also enabled.

use_memory.description: Whether or not to use the memory from the KoboldAI GUI when generating text.

use_story.description: Whether or not to use the story from the KoboldAI GUI when generating text.

use_userscripts.description: Whether or not to use the userscripts from the KoboldAI GUI when generating text.

use_world_info.description: Whether or not to use the world info from the KoboldAI GUI when generating text.

model.description: Hugging Face model ID, the path to a model folder (relative to the "models" folder in the KoboldAI root folder) or "ReadOnly" for no model

value.description: Soft prompt name, or a string containing only whitespace for no soft prompt. If using the GET method and no soft prompt is loaded, this will always be the empty string.

results.description: Array of story actions. The array is sorted such that actions closer to the end of this array are closer to the end of the story.

num.description: Guaranteed to not equal the `num` of any other active story chunk. Equals 0 iff this is the first action of the story (the prompt).

text.description: The text inside this story chunk.

disable_input_formatting.description: When enabled, disables all input formatting options, overriding their individual enabled/disabled states.

frmtadsnsp.description: Input formatting option. When enabled, adds a leading space to your input if there is no trailing whitespace at the end of the previous action.

items.description: 32-bit signed integer unique to this world info entry.

comment.description: The comment/description/title for this world info entry.

constant.description: Whether or not constant mode is enabled for this world info entry.

content.description: The "What To Remember" for this entry.

key.description: Comma-separated list of keys, or of primary keys if selective mode is enabled.

keysecondary.description: Comma-separated list of secondary keys if selective mode is enabled.

selective.description: Whether or not selective mode is enabled for this world info entry.

uid.description: 32-bit signed integer unique to this world info entry.

name.description: Name of this world info folder.

uid.description: 32-bit signed integer unique to this world info folder.

name.description: Name of this world info folder.

32-bit signed integer unique to this world info entry.

post.description:
Generates text given a submission, sampler settings, soft prompt and number of return sequences.

By default, the story, userscripts, memory, author's note and world info are disabled.

Unless otherwise specified, optional values default to the values in the KoboldAI GUI.

example.prompt: Niko the kobold stalked carefully down the alley, his small scaly figure obscured by a dusky cloak that fluttered lightly in the cold winter breeze.

results.text: Holding up his tail to keep it from dragging in the dirty snow that covered the cobblestone, he waited patiently for the butcher to turn his attention from his stall so that he could pilfer his next meal: a tender-looking chicken.

get.description:
Returns all world info entries currently shown in the KoboldAI GUI.

The `folders` are sorted in the same order as they are in the GUI and the `entries` within the folders and within the parent `result` object are all sorted in the same order as they are in their respective parts of the GUI.
get.summary: Retrieve all world info entries

get.description:
Returns details about all world info folders currently shown in the KoboldAI GUI.

The `folders` are sorted in the same order as they are in the GUI.
get.summary: Retrieve all world info folders

post.summary: Create a new world info folder at the end of the world info

get.description:
Returns all world info entries that are not in a world info folder.

The `entries` are sorted in the same order as they are in the KoboldAI GUI.
get.summary: Retrieve all world info entries not in a folder

post.summary: Create a new world info entry outside of a world info folder, at the end of the world info
